subject: Now Hiring: Research Assistant (Computer Science, GMU)
body:
External Message: Use Caution


Dear Student,

I‚Äôm reaching out from George Mason University to share an exciting opportunity for a Remote Research Associate Position.

This role is perfect for students who are passionate about learning and eager to contribute to meaningful research. No prior experience in psychology is required‚Äîjust curiosity, commitment, and a willingness to collaborate in a dynamic research team.

Highlights:

  *   üåç 100% Remote Work

  *   üí∞ Competitive Weekly Compensation

  *   üìö No Prior Experience Needed

If you‚Äôre ready to take part in this rewarding experience, Click Here Now to Apply<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe2BL2dapIwzEy_T-tZlQfsiwBpK-9irngpnRSGnCXHYGVB4A/viewform?usp=header>.

We look forward to reviewing your application!

Best regards,
Antonios Anastasopoulos
Assistant Professor
College of Engineering and Computing
George Mason University
4511 Patriot Cir, Fairfax, VA 22030
